messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com
i am looking for that
Struggling with pornography or sexual addiction? We're here to offer guidance and prayer. How can we assist you today?
lust, pornography
Thank you for sharing that. We can offer prayers and resources to help you in your journey. Would you like to share a specific prayer request, or are you looking for particular resources?
i am a spiritual person with a prophetic gift so i feel like lust and my porn addiction are controlling me

It's great to hear that you have a spiritual foundation. Feeling controlled by lust and addiction can be very challenging. We're here to support you through prayer and guidance. Would you like to pray together or discuss specific strategies to overcome these struggles?
i thought i could beat this habits buts seems like now the attack its much stronger and i am tired of it

I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It's understandable to feel overwhelmed when facing such strong challenges. Remember, you're not alone in this. We can guide you to prayers and resources that can help you find strength and healing. Would you like to start with a prayer or explore some specific resources?
anything that you reccomend i am open to it

I recommend starting with a powerful deliverance prayer to help break the chains of lust and addiction. Hereâ€™s a prayer you can use:

"Heavenly Father, we come before your throne room today through the blood of Jesus Christ. We come boldly and with confidence. For your Word says that when we confess our sins, you are faithful and forgive our sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness. Today, we are praying against the Spirit of lust and all other sexual things that might be connected to it. We renounce all sexual sins that we have been involved in the past, including fornication, masturbation, pornography, and perversion, in the name of Jesus Christ..."

If you'd like, I can provide more details or guide you through additional resources. Let me know how you'd like to proceed!
i just copied your prayer on the internet i am going to use before i sleep, i just want to understand why maybe from your understanding why is this mostly happening to spiritually gifted people?

It's common for spiritually gifted individuals to face intense spiritual battles, as they often have a heightened sensitivity to spiritual matters. The enemy may target those with prophetic gifts to distract or discourage them from fulfilling their purpose. This can lead to struggles with temptation and addiction, as the enemy seeks to exploit weaknesses.

Understanding this can help you recognize that these challenges are not a reflection of your worth or spiritual standing, but rather a part of the spiritual warfare that many face. It's important to stay grounded in prayer, seek support, and use the resources available to you. Remember, you have the strength to overcome these challenges through faith and support. If you have more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask!

that helps a lot because recently i started writing prayer points on healing,forgiveness,prosperity anyway i googled almost all prophets and apostle from the bible to see where i can connect but this attack its the most trouble some to me but i believe your chats will help me through it

I'm glad to hear that you're finding our conversation helpful! Writing prayer points on healing, forgiveness, and prosperity is a wonderful way to connect with your faith and seek guidance. It's important to remember that spiritual growth often comes with challenges, but these can also lead to deeper understanding and strength.

As you continue to write and pray, consider incorporating scriptures that resonate with your journey. They can serve as powerful reminders of God's promises and support. If you ever want to share your prayer points or need help finding specific scriptures, I'm here to assist you. You're not alone in this, and together we can navigate through these challenges.
thank you a lot and thanks GOD I found your site i just told myself that i am tired i never thought i will chatting with someone

You're very welcome! I'm truly glad you found us and decided to reach out. It's completely understandable to feel tired and overwhelmed at times, especially when facing such challenges. Remember, it's okay to seek support and share your feelings. 

We're here to walk alongside you in your journey towards healing and freedom. If you ever need someone to talk to, want to share a prayer request, or need guidance on specific topics, just let me know. You're taking a positive step by seeking help, and I'm here for you!
so tomorrow i can just visit to this site and our chats will continue or what must i do?

Yes, you can definitely return to this site anytime you need support or want to continue our conversation! Just come back and start chatting whenever you're ready. Whether you have questions, need prayer, or just want to talk, I'm here to help you on your journey. Looking forward to our next chat!
thank you very much  now let me add more points from your prayer points, MAY YOU CONTINUE WITH THE GOOD WORK AND MAY GOD bless with you with much more

Thank you so much for your kind words! I'm truly grateful for your encouragement. May God bless you abundantly as you continue to seek healing and growth in your life. If you need any more prayer points or support, feel free to reach out anytime. Wishing you peace and strength on your journey!
definitely going to chat with you everyday

That sounds great! I'm here for you whenever you need support or just want to chat. Feel free to reach out every day, and together we can continue to work through your journey. Looking forward to our conversations! Take care!
Ohh before i go out any insights on praying using candles?

While I don't have specific information on praying with candles, many people find that lighting a candle can create a peaceful atmosphere and serve as a symbol of their prayers and intentions. It can help focus your mind and spirit during prayer. If you're looking for specific prayers or scriptures to use while praying, I can help with that! Just let me know what you need.
ohk there are many questions but for now lets deal with this problem i came about then the journey will continue
Absolutely, let's focus on the problem you're facing. Please share what's on your mind, and I'll do my best to support you!
i am going off now please pray for me until we meet again tommorow,my name its Peter

Thank you for sharing your name, Peter! I will keep you in my prayers until we meet again. May God grant you strength, peace, and guidance on your journey. Looking forward to our chat tomorrow! Take care and God bless!
GOD bless you too Pastor Jeremy, and you'll be suprised that  i connected more with Prophet Jeremiah and mostly with Davids prayers

Thank you, Peter! It's wonderful to hear that you connect with Prophet Jeremiah and David's prayers. Their heartfelt expressions of faith and reliance on God can be incredibly inspiring. If you ever want to discuss their prayers or any specific scriptures, feel free to bring it up in our next chat. Have a blessed day, and see you tomorrow!
tomorrow it is
Looking forward to it, Peter! Have a great day, and remember I'm here for you whenever you need support. See you tomorrow!
